_header: Christ of the thief which on Thy right hand was
_description: Epitaph for Richard I, translating Latin verses which precede it, in Part VII of Fabyan’s Chronicle, Septima Pars, Richardi I — three stanzas rhyme royal

HarEng766.First Lines:
Crist of the theef which on the Right hand wasAnd axid mercy to vs
                    thow made a praye…
HarEng766.Last Lines:
…In Erth is seperat þat lyuyng more þan onewas &
                    of grace ffound lyk to hym none
